titles.title: A resolution acknowledging and congratulating Miami Dade College on the occasion of its 50th anniversary of service to the students and residents of the State of Florida.
A resolution acknowledging and congratulating Miami Dade College on the occasion of its 50th anniversary of service to the students and residents of the State of Florida.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: Congratulates Miami Dade College on the occasion of its 50th anniversary for its academic excellence and service to Florida residents.
